Uses of Interface
com.sri.common.net.SRISocketReader

Packages that use SRISocketReader
com.sri.common.net Contains a set of classes which are common to all application types and are used for network communication. 
com.sri.kernel.comm Contains classes used for communications. 
 

Uses of SRISocketReader in com.sri.common.net
 

Classes in com.sri.common.net that implement SRISocketReader
 class DefaultSRISocketReader
           This provides a default implementation of the SRISocketReader interface.
 

Constructors in com.sri.common.net with parameters of type SRISocketReader
SRISocket(SRISocketReader reader, java.lang.String site, int port, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String pass)
          This is used to open a new socket with the given [site] and [port].
SRISocket(SRISocketReader reader, java.net.Socket socket, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String pass)
          This is used when an existing Socket has been create.
 

Uses of SRISocketReader in com.sri.kernel.comm
 

Classes in com.sri.kernel.comm that implement SRISocketReader
 class CommServer
           This is the kernels implementation of the SRTP protocol.
